price: Mu by’ukuri Allah ari kumwe na ba bandi bamugandukira, ndetse na ba bandi bakora ibyiza.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
